file_content.text: Bleb-Blek's reputation much better now thanks to your help.
You return. Bleb-Blek hoping and hoping you find Jedi Padawan and save her from the sand fever.
But Jedi Padawan not with you. Is she saved or did fever claim her?
There was nothing that could be done.
She's dead.
Bleb-Blek feels smaller now than ever. Warning did no good. You go into desert for nothing.
She's receiving treatment for her illness.
[Lie] She's safe.
Utinni! You mean it? Bleb-Blek's alert was in time? Bleb-Blek sent you into desert and save the day!
So it was you? You sent this hero to rescue us from the Sand People? Oh thank you, thank you, friend Jawa!
Bleb-Blek's actions helped after all. People saved because of Bleb-Blek. Bleb-Blek not even care now if map found.
This right? Bleb-Blek's actions save Padawan and also other peoples! Bleb-Blek not even care about getting map back.
The Padawan still had it. Take it.
Here's your map.
Bleb-Blek's map! Utinni!
Pay me something, and I'll gladly hand it over.
The map is yours for a price.
Here, I'll pay for the Jawa's map.
Bleb-Blek most grateful.
It's the least I can do for you.
Bleb-Blek so happy you came to Jawa camp.
I found it, so it's mine now.
I'm keeping the map.
Keep it. Bleb-Blek's spirit salvaged by saved settlers. All that matters to Bleb-Blek.
Keep it. Bleb-Blek is hero, so happy not care about map.
Bleb-Blek not see Padawan with you. Bleb-Blek hope you find her, help her with fever.
Listen. Please, listen to me. Won't someone listen?
You! You there. I Bleb-Blek and I needs your ear. Very important. Jedi Padawan in much distress!
She has the sand fever. Face brighter red and she ranting a madness. Something must be done for Padawan.
Keep it simple. My Jawaese is a little rusty.
Slow down, little guy.
My time is credits. And as long as I'm with you, I'm not making any.
Make it quick.
Bleb-Blek talk fast. Bleb-Blek not waste time.
Nice and slow, give me the pertinent details.
Remain calm and debrief me.
Bleb-Blek try to calm, want to make sense to you.
I have very little time between orders.
Make it quick.
I'm on a very vital mission for the Republic.
I don't have a lot of time.
Soldiers always moving fast, have important things to do.
If there is a Padawan in trouble, you have my full attention.
Of course I'll help.
Please hurry the telling. The galaxy is filled with crises that require my attention.
I don't have a lot of time.
My mission here is of great importance to the Republic and the safety of the galaxy.
I don't have a lot of time.
This sounds troubling. Tell me everything you know.
Please explain.
Bleb-Blek relief, you first to listen.
There are pressing matters I must attend to.
I don't have much time.
I know, I sure. Jedi have much important things to do. And so I worry for Padawan.
Are you sure you're not the one "ranting a madness?"
You sound crazy.
Bleb-Blek not crazy, Bleb-Blek concerned is all.
Jedi Padawan come through camp, talk nonsense about vengeance. Nonsense about Sand People.
Bleb-Blek try to help, try to calm. But fever take Padawan, Padawan take Bleb-Blek map, run into desert, say kill Sand People.
Bad news.
Yes, Padawan sick, maybe worse, sand fever deadly.
The Padawan may be under more severe stresses than you know.
Odd behavior for a Jedi.
Bleb-Blek seen it, sand fever can cripple mightiest.
I'm sure this Padawan can take care of herself.
You shouldn't worry.
But Padawan not herself, Padawan sick, maybe worse, sand fever deadly.
Why tell me?
You can go to Sand People camp, you can find Padawan, stop Padawan, get her safe and treatment.
Bleb-Blek young for Jawa, still needs desert map. But more worried for Padawan. Will you help her?
I must.
Bleb-Blek thankful. Bleb-Blek hope for your success.
I suppose.
Bleb-Blek hope you can, Bleb-Blek hope not too late.
Sand People camp deeper in desert. Bleb-Blek think of nothing else until you return.
Sorry, little guy. I'm after bigger fish than a crazy Padawan girl.
No can do. [Refuse quest]
My mission takes precedence.
Sorry. [Refuse quest]
The Padawan got herself into this trouble, she'll have to get herself out.
I must say no. [Refuse quest]
Then Bleb-Blek is crushed. You were Bleb-Blek's best hope.
Bleb-Blek got much on mind. Must wonder and figure for himself.
